name: Waist Support
descr:
Comfortable, flexible back support and support to help you tone and strengthen weak stomach muscles. Hook and velcro closure adheres anywhere on the waist trimmer allowing easy adjustment of support. The waist trimmer enhances benefits of exercise to help lose unwanted inches.

One size fits all.

Available in widths of 14 cm and 20 cm with length of 100 cm and 130 cm.
